Articles.Content: Hello! I was wondering if there were any manual recovery mods, because I think it would be fun to create things like trucks or boats in order to recover landed crafts and bring them safely back to the KSC.![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Well, theres the abstract stage recovery mod. Still though, there isn't a single 'recovery mod' as you describe, but what you describe is easily doable with KIS+KAS and theres a number of mods out there with car and boat models.

Are you looking for a mod to disable the "recover" button? You can just not press it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Or are you looking for methods of manual recovery (cranes, boats, etc)?

FYI to level up your Kerbals without recovering, you can use [Kolonists](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106103). The "stock remix" version uses the stock science lab, so you don't need MKS/OKS.
